title: Billionaire spacewalker pleads his case to lead NASA, again, in Senate hearing
description: Jared Isaacman, the tech entrepreneur who's been on two SpaeX flights, was yanked and then renominated by President Donald Trump.
content: Billionaire spacewalker Jared Isaacman urged senators on Wednesday to take swift action on his bid to lead NASA, after being yanked and then renominated by President Donald Trump.Isaacman appeared be… [+2932 chars]
